## useMediaTrack (hook)

### Import

```typescript
import { useMediaTrack } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

{% usage name="usemediatrack" package="@livekit/components-react" exampleCount=0 /%}

## Parameters

| Parameter   | Type                                                                           | Description  |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------ |
| source      | [VideoSource](./core//videosource.md) \| [AudioSource](./core//audiosource.md) |              |
| participant | Participant                                                                    | _(Optional)_ |
| options     | [UseMediaTrackOptions](./react//usemediatrackoptions.md)                       | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

{ publication: import("livekit-client").TrackPublication \| undefined; isMuted: boolean \| undefined; isSubscribed: boolean \| undefined; track: import("livekit-client").Track \| undefined; elementProps: import("react").HTMLAttributes&lt;HTMLElement&gt;; }
